author: Staff Reporter
text: Nagavathi reservoir was opened for irrigation here for watershed areas in Pennagaram on Monday. Over 39.80 cusecs of water was being released to irrigate over 1,993 acres in three villages of Aragasanahalli, Chinnampalli, and Perumpaalai in Pennagaram. Water was being released from the right and the left sluices for 100 days, said an administration release.
title: Water released for irrigation
